alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 30 at 1:29AM MDT until November 01 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest wind gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Beartooth Foothills and Livingston Area. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Interstate 90 from Livingston to Big Timber and roads along the Beartooth Foothills. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts may subside some Monday afternoon, but will increase again Monday evening.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route. Secure outdoor objects.
